articles.title: EU clears Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine for adolescents - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: The European Commission on Friday authorized Pfizer and partner BioNTech SE's COVID-19 vaccine for use in children as young as 12, paving the way for a broader roll-out in the bloc after similar clearances in the United States and Canada.
